bid/ask matching with pre-funded escrow and dispute resolution FUTURE: ERC-20 Token Support -------------------------- Currently supports native ETH escrow only. before funding Note: Settlement Agent fees (separate from escrow) already support USDC via the x402 payment service params._ap2ProofHash: Hash of the AP2 payment proof
params._stripePaymentIntentId: Stripe payment intent ID for verification

cancelMatch(bytes32).notice: Cancel a match (only if timeout reached and not settled)

createMatch(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).notice: Create a new match between bid and ask intents

disputeMatch(bytes32,string).notice: Initiate a dispute for a match

escrowBalances(bytes32,address).notice: Escrow balances for each match participant

getEscrowBalance(bytes32,address).notice: Get escrow balance for a party in a match

matches(bytes32).notice: Mapping from match ID to Match data

settleMatch(bytes32,bytes32,string).notice: Settle a match with AP2 payment proof
